knows_anything.Murderer: Why would I tell you anything? You wouldn’t believe me anyway.
knows_anything.Witness: I saw {0} near the scene. Didn’t think much of it at first, but now... it seems suspicious.
knows_anything.Informant: You might want to talk to {0}. I’ve got reason to believe they saw something.

knows_anything.None: I keep to myself. I don’t know anything that could help you.

alibi.Murderer: I don’t need an alibi. I’m not saying anything. Let the evidence speak.

alibi.Informant: I was in the library, on my own. You can check with the guards.

alibi.None: I was in the common room, plenty of people saw me.
